data.text: Boso bummoninanga disofi phuila yi nlangu,
Muelꞌama wulembo moni phuila yi Nzambi,
Matsuela mama mawu maba bidia biama
Bila mbi vongidi bobo, a muelꞌama e ?
Muelꞌama widi wuvonga mu khati nitu ama
Mu muini, Yave wumfidisanga luzolo luandi
Mimvesi miama milmbo moni phasi yi lufua ;
Bila mbi vongidi bobo, a muelꞌama e ?
